ComicInfo.Title: Guests of Honor; Masked Marauder
ComicInfo.Summary:
Shear Erotic: A collie turns shearing a sheep into a sensual experience.
The Masked Marauder: A masked man breaks into a woman's bedroom and demands sex.
Workman's Comp: Piggy changes the work policy at the palace to prevent future worker injury claims.
Things I Found While Yahooeying: The artist's furry personae describes some of the horrors that can be found surfing the internet.
Guests of Honor: James makes the mistake of taking the Skunk Sisters to a comic convention specializing in furry and funny animal comics.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev110 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-28 18:27:37. [Issue ID 200783]
